titleStmt.title: More haste than good speed, or, The Devil's got a horse-back being a winding-sheet for weathercocks and the turn-coats of the times : with the tryal of the Lord Kill-devil ... with divers others, and the arraignment and conviction of several malefactors.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print showthrough with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
